_header: A man was the first guilt
_description: A Christmas carol — four quatrains and burden: ‘All þat leue in Christen lay / Worschup euery Cristmes day’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Aman was þe fyrst gylt& þer for he was
                    spilt…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines: …for euery man to hel gangooIt was lityl mery thoo
